place_description:
Open 7 days! Ages 7+. Cool place, lots of adoptable cats to hang with (don't bring your own, we have it covered!) while sipping on some tasty beverages in a zen atmosphere! Our guests pay by the hour and reservations are highly encouraged, although walk-ins are welcome if we have the space!

We keep our cafe and cat lounge separate, you're welcome to stop in for coffee or wine, too! Come on in!

reviews_data.review_text: This place is amazing! Their coffee tastes like heaven! They have amazing employees. The atmosphere is the best part though. There is cute kitties everywhere!
Super cute and fun experience. Ashlynn was so kind! Greatly recommend.
So much fun!  Would come back!
No food, but had good latte. And how can hanging out with cats be bad?!
Very nice place. Great beverages, and you get to spend half an hour with rescue cats! If you wish, you can adopt any of them on site! Very friendly staff as well. Kids had a great time!
Won't be getting my cat from here
Lots of fun latte flavors
10/10 experience. Kitties were adorable, coffee was delicious and the workers were so sweet.

Such a great place and I have to say the staff do such a good job taking care of the cats. The cats seem so happy, well fed, and playful.

The coffee was great as well!! I got the brown sugar oat latte. It was perfect. Very sweet though - if that's not your thing.

Cute cats + great coffee? We even did cat tarot card readings . It was a phenomenal time.
We loved our experience and hope to go again soon
Two hours with these cute cats! The people are so friendly. I love the location too.

This was my first time coming into a Mac Tabby Cafe and I had a great time. The cafe space is so cozy and the vibes are great. The space as well as the bathroom are very clean. I really enjoyed my strawberry matcha while I waited. Samantha and Jordan were very kind and made me feel right at home. Their customer service was top tier. All the kitties were so cute and I'm looking forward to coming back to adopt! 10 out of 10 would recommend!
Very rude customer service! Had to cancel our order. Wouldn't do any business here.
cutest cats and staff is very nice
Catastic establishment! Great environment, great felines, top tier employees! Love coming here!
Great place to hang out with kitties and drink coffee - so glad that many of these darling felines are finding homes!

I had so much fun here. The woman working the counter was so nice. Their decor was super cute. The best part of course was the cats. I had the best time playing with them. Especially their two senior cats they have right now.
So much fun.   A definite to do list item.
Place to play with cats and coffee and matcha latte
This place is so amazing
Love this place. Would highly recommend if you are cat lover.
Excellent customer service here and their mission is so admirable
Have to make a reservation. You can have coffee and pet their cats  Nice ambience. Parking is the issue, have to park in side streets.

We flew into Charlotte in the morning and were looking for things to do until we could check into our hotel. We found Mac Tabby and easily made a reservation.When we arrived, we were greeted by a staff member and escorted to the cat room. It was great! There were other people in the room, but it wasn't crowded at all. There were plenty of places to sit and many interactive toys to play with. It was clean and the cats were well cared for. They had places to climb and they could get away from the humans if they wanted to. All the cats were so sweet and playful. The hour went way too quickly! If we find ourselves in Charlotte again, we'll definitely be back!
The cats are so cute! Make sure to reserve ahead of time if you plan to go there!

The cats are adorable and the service is
Impeccable.

Another amazing cat cafe! Relaxing atmosphere, friendly staff. Beautiful cat lounge area that is kept very clean. Such playful & cuddly kitties. Great coffee & super cute merch! Just can't say enough good things. Thank you Lori & team for all you do!
My family and I enjoy coming out to MacTabby to get away and hang out with the cats. The cats are cute and the coffee is great.

Kitschy atmosphere that aligns perfectly with NODA's aesthetic and a cat lovers paradise. I stopped by to kill some time on a staycation from work and figured I'd check out the cat room and read for a bit. How naive of me. I spent a majority of my hour reservation (walk ins are 30 mins, many slots open last night when I booked) playing with Moonstone. I picked up a toy just seconds after walking in and she ran up to me with laser focus. She is as energetic and playful as she is beautiful (her eyes and the PINK in her nose ). She also let me get a few pets in, but didn't want to be so affectionate when she was trained on that toy. So I let her play herself out. And she was very entertaining. Lots of bunny hops, dives, sploots, and butt shakes. Someone go get her. I'm full up with my two at home and my eldest already wants to be the solo star of the show, but I know she will bring someone a lot of joy.

I do regret getting a canned drink and not trying their coffee, but I can attest it smelled very good and will use that as an excuse to visit again.
O espaco e muito limpo , nem parece que tem gato , os gatinhos sao fofos , pena que fui a noite e eles ja estavam cansados , mas e uma passeio que vale a pena .

We adore this place! It's tucked in the heart of Noda and has all the charm you could hope for in a cat cafe. The cats are happy, playful and well cared for. Nearly 2,000 have been adopted from Mac Tabby and I can see why! We love coming to visit, grabbing a drink, and spending a peaceful hour with the kitties. The staff is friendly and helpful.
Very pleasant experience! Lovely ladies working there and the atmosphere was great! Very, very clean and good drinks!!
We loved it and will definitely be back. It was so relaxing.

You in a room with a dozen or so cats.  What's not to like?

Prices are reasonable ($14/person for an hour with the kitties, and my daughter got a latte drink for $4.50 and I paid $2 for a bottled water).  The building is a beautiful old 1886 building that is sadly smushed in between two modern soulless seven-story apartment boxes.  Inside there's a small coffee shop area and the separate cat room.  The cat room typically has about 12 cats (all adoptable) and you can play with them or just watch them have fun, you're only asked not to pick them up or handle them but you can certainly pet them and get cuddles from them if they climb into your lap!

The staff is excellent, the cats are healthy and friendly, the price is reasonable, and the facility is comfortable.  We will definitely come back.

Super cute cats! Their cats are so sweet and nice and they love to play with people. They have a waiting room next to the cafe so if you arrive too early you can stay there and can order drinks too. It was so fun and I want to go back next time!
This place is lovely. Highly recommend. The coffee and snacks are excellent too

Wonderful experience all around. It was easy to reserve our spot online and very reasonably priced. Warm and welcoming atmosphere with friendly staff. It's very spacious in the cafe and lounge area giving you enough space to relax even when busy. We loved meeting all the kitties and look forward to visiting again soon!
Have a drink and pet some kitties, what could be better? All of these cats were available for adoption on 10/10/24.
Such a cool place with someone very unique would definitely recommend had so much fun

Got an iced chai tea latte with oat milk, quite tasty! We were there for the cats, so the drink was a nice bonus! They had a good beer selection too. They get new cats on Thursday, or that's what we were told. So if you're interested in adoption, they said Thursday am was the best time to come

my boyfriend surprised me with coffee and cat time last year for my birthday and i've been obsessed ever since. the entire vibe of the cafe/cat room is amazing and the decor is adorable! ALSO, the coffee is the best i've found in Charlotte. which is a big reason why i love the place so much, not to mention the cats!

Fantastic place! Would highly recommend to come visit - not just if your in the area, but make a trip! Don't worry, there's plenty else around as well.

This is where we got our big orange lover boy Leo from (formerly Diego)

Staff is fantastic, cats are amazing, drinks are great. Love this place and would recommend whether your looking to adopt, or just want a nice place to relax and pet a cat!

I absolutely love this place. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a cozy, welcoming atmosphere. The staff is so sweet and the drinks are delicious. On top of that, you have the opportunity to spend time with sweet cats... and they're all rescues that are up for adoption. Whether you're a cat lover or just looking for a unique spot to unwind, Mac Tabby is a must-visit in Charlotte.

Everything was great with friendly staff and the cats!

However, I thought the music was too loud. My ears were ringing a bit when I left and I'd assume that would also be too loud for the cats.
Great place to kill 30 mins with some nice cats, great customer service.

I went to Mac Tabby for my birthday with my husband, mom, and aunt  and we had the best time! All of the cats were social and enjoyed playing and receiving pets. I ordered an Iced Pumpkin Chai Latte and it was so tasty. My family enjoyed the selection of canned adult beverages and said they were all a) things they hadn't seen before and b) delicious. The staff was very personable and let us give the cats some treats since it was a special occasion! My family said they definitely want to come back and I couldn't agree more

Hello all! If there has ever been a hard review for me to write, it is this one. I have been debating it for days, but I decided it's a big enough issue that I should follow through with it. I'd like to preface by saying that me and my boyfriend have come to the Charlotte Mac Tabby location for 3+ years. We have been loyal customers. It's a date we always look forward to and count the days down on!

Last Wednesday I had a laparoscopic ovarian cystectomy with the addition of a surprise laparoscopic uterosacral nerve ablation. I decided to book a one-hour kitty date for me and my boyfriend, who goes to college in Virginia and came to visit me during this difficult time of my life, for that Saturday to get me out of the house. Oh boy! I woke up that morning feeling the worst I had since the surgery, it was rough but I decided the date would be worth it. Or so I thought.

For those used to the Charlotte location, you know there is a troublesome flight of stairs leading up to the door. About 20-30. I had told my boyfriend to stay behind me in case I fall or become weak, as this was the first time I had been out of the house since surgery as well as the first flight of stairs I walked up. For some reason, a worker of Mac Tabby (white, middle-aged+, average height male) who was sweeping the area above the stairs decided it would be the perfect time to make side comments about how "it must be such a workout going up those stairs" for me. We did not respond at first, as I was more concerned with not tripping over my own feet, however; he did not let this stop him. He continued making the same comment 2 or 3 more times about the stairs being "such a workout" for me. Once I got to the top of the stairs I informed him I had surgery, but rather than apologize he doubled down and said once more how rough it must be to walk up some stairs with a sarcastic tone. Wow, how kind.

I tried to not let it bother me at first, although later I lost that battle and brought it up to a worker who seemed to understand where I was coming from and decided to get the owner involved. Once the owner came over she did not seem as understanding. At all. Right off the bat, how I felt was dismissed by her and she made excuses for him saying they say that to each other all the time and there's no way he could've known I had surgery. That's the point! You are coworkers, you know each other. He does NOT KNOW ME! Or what I've been through!! I am highly disappointed that it took me showing this lady my stitches and bruises for her to act as if she knew where I was coming from. Bottom line, don't make comments about your customers you do with your coworkers. Do not make comments with them, especially ones that can be taken as very rude and demeaning. You do not know what people struggle with every day. Some people have disabilities, and climbing those stairs may be the hardest part of their day- don't be a jackass about it! Don't make it harder! I don't care if you make comments to each other at work, be careful who you say that shit to because I am not your coworker I am a paying customer who crawled out of her bed after a very rough surgery to try to have a better day. This experience demonstrates a lack of management understanding. Which is upsetting since me and my boyfriend really loved the experience this place brought us.

Needless to say, me and my boyfriend will not be back to this location. We will try our luck at other locations and pray we don't have workers make comments about our body there. This has been a disappointing experience, to say the least.

Their drinks are pretty good though and the cats are innocent in all this. Adopt them!!
I always love coming here. The atmosphere is great. The staff works hard and the lattes and lemonades are wonderful. It's also clear the cats are well cared for.
Such a sweet place to have great coffee and pet cats. The staff is so nice. Highly recommend this.
So cute! And the staff was great
A magical place to escape to  I could visit these little angels everyday!!! Highly recommend. Thank you!!!
My kids and I had THE BEST time playing with the kitties this morning!

This is a long overdue review. Came from out of state and visited way back in December 2023 on a weekday morning. Got the cats all to ourselves. lol.

The cafe area is so cozy and has such a chill vibe. The cats are in a separate room which you can see through a glass wall. One thing I love about the cat lounge area is it feels so homey like you're in someone's living room. This is one of the best cat Cafe I've visited and I've been to many. I still reminisce about this place.
I have gone a couple of times and it's always a fun experience. The kitty's are so cute and funny.
We loved getting to hang out with sweet cats, good drinks, and the staff were extra kind giving us treats for the cats, so they engaged with our kids.

The cafe is a bit overpriced for the one hour of cat time, however, the cats are well fed and happy and the drinks are decently priced (non coffee drinks aren't too good but coffee drinks are great)
You do get decent cat interaction, unless there are more customers, in which case it feels like everyone is fighting for the cats attention.
If you're lucky, you get handed some treats and get to feed the cats- this brings them to you for sure.
Great atmosphere. Fun experience.
Very friendly staff and lots of cats! Great variety of drinks as well.
Loved going to the Max Tabby Cat Cafe! So many cute and sweet kitties, love that these kitties are so well treated as they find homes.

Even if you don't want to chill with the cats this place has great drinks and ambiance.  We DID hang out with the cats and they were wonderful - very healthy and in a great space. We had a fabulous time.
Really cute, clean place to visit with the cats and grab a coffee or adult beverage. The staff is very helpful and kind.
Everyone was friendly, the drinks were amazing, all the cats were playful, the atmosphere was calming,  me and my family enjoyed it

Lori and the other employee when I visited were both very welcoming and easygoing! It was so nice to see all the different kitties and personalities they had there. I bought the hour session, and it was totally worth it!
Such a good place that definitely recommend for cat lovers

I have a moderate cat allergy. I have a very strong sense of smell and a real aversion to the 'cat smell'. I had some reservations about visiting Mac Tabby yesterday.  It was without a doubt a great experience in every way! There was ZERO smell. It was SUPER clean. Like no cat hair anywhere!  I had no allergy reactions at all. The cafe is decorated so quirky and yet so aesthetically pleasing. I had the apple crisp latte and my daughter had the honey lavender. Both were soooooo good (thanks Julia!). Staff was friendly and engaged with customers and cats but not over the top. The cats were friendly and the cat room was spacious. If I were a cat I'd want to go there and hang out. The focus on adoption and the love they all have for rescues and for the cats is intentional. And I  felt  that in every  part of this cafe. It was a great experience and I will absolutely be back!
So much fun! No food, but lots of fun drinks to sip on while getting snuggles from the cats. Even my 20 year old had fun. Definitely recommend supporting this place.

this is one of the best places! part cafe, part cat playroom/adoption, you get to play with kitties and, if you're lucky, will bond with one and can take him/her home with you! the staff is sweet, knowledgeable, and cat lovers. can't wait to go back!
Unique place & great cold brew coffees. Super helpful staff!
The drinks are good, love the cats

We love this cafe!(we went to the Concord location) Great vibes, very friendly staff, affectionate playful cats- what more could you ask for? We'll definitely be visiting again and adopting in the future. Thank you for a fun afternoon

We had a great experience at the Concord location! The facility was very clean and well maintained. The environment and staff were warm and welcoming. Service was great! We ordered our drinks before our reservation time and the staff brought them into the room while we were playing with the cats when they were ready. You can tell that the cats are very well cared for and happy. Also had one of the best chai lattes I've ever had here!

Mac Tabby Cat Cafe in Charlotte NC was so much fun! First off, they have an extensive list of coffees, beers and other beverages like kombucha! I had a cold brew and it was delicious! The service was friendly and swift! The prices for the drinks were reasonable as well! The best part was the cat cafe! We walked in and were able to play with the kitties for $10 per person for 30 minutes. You can also book online in advance! We played and watched the cats! Was so much fun! They had toys so we could play with them! The best part is they are adoptable! Such an amazing idea!!! A great experience! Great for kids and out of towners! Will definitely go back!!!
We had a great time!
The only one wine bar in NODA. Owner was nice and attentive.

I was a bit hesitant to go because of my cat allergy, but turns out the cafe and cat areas are separate, so no problem there!

The vintage, green-heavy decor with all those cute knick-knacks really gave the place a cool vibe. I went for the first smoothie on the menu (can't remember the name, oops). It had banana, peanut butter, and a bunch of other stuff, but surprisingly, it wasn't heavy on the peanut butter at all. The flavors blended into something totally new and delicious.

The staff was super friendly too. All in all, it was a great experience!

Had a really fun time with all the cats! The workers do check in and remind you when your reserved hour is almost up which was good because you can definitely get lost with cat time. Overall excellent experience will be back!!

This is a wonderful way to spend an hour in the Concord area. Staff was knowledgeable and professional the entire time. Cats had plenty of space to play and live. The cats were playful and sweet. All of the cats are waiting for a forever home.
Stumbled on this place walking around saw cats and coffee and I was hooked!! Super chill staff, awesome cold brew, and adorable cats. If i could give unlimited stars I would!

This is one of my favorite places in Charlotte to go to. There is free street parking all around NoDo and we usually have no problem finding parking. This location is not accessible friendly but their two other locations are.

My sister scheduled me an appointment online to come to this cat cafe while she was at work! The cat section is completely closed off in another section (with plenty of windows to see in) - so even if you have allergies you can come and enjoy the very delicious coffee and watch others enjoy the company of the cats.
They have a ton of other options - beer/other alcoholic drinks.
The staff were very friendly.

The cats are all adoptable. They've helped over 1670 cats get adopted so far!

Who wants to make a puppy/dog cafe next?!
Turned away because my daughter was 5 on Father's Day weekend. Been to a number of cat cafes with zero issue. Stupid policy.

Amazing cat caffe, really friendly staff and wonderful fluffy cats!! I Would recommend going after a few weeks as most cats are adopted quickly so you'll have a new experience every time. All cats are very young and friendly!

Updated review
Visited the Cafe in a total of 2 times to play with all the cute kitties and cats. All were wonderful, sweet and some were shy. I went with a goal of finding my forever kitty and I did. Hopefully in the future when I'm ready, I'll come to find a sibling for my fur baby.
Was very warm and welcoming! Would recommend.

Apart from the great experience with the kitties, the staff was incredible and the drinks were so amazing. The drink menu was huge and they were happy to try out new combination of flavors, as well as help us make a selection.

Fun atmosphere,  good looking goodies and options of coffee, smoothies etc. Pepsi products..no thanks.
Cat room clean  and kitties look very well taken care o. Great place to spend time with cats and to adopt one.
Super sweet staff and cats!

They don't always check their cats for fleas so WATCH OUT WHAT YOU MAY BRING HOME!  LOVE what they do but they need to be more careful.  Also it would be better to give the cats an hour rest, 2 or 3 times during each day, so that when we come they wouldn't all be hiding & tired out from strangers wanting to touch them. There would be fewer available appointments but they would be a higher quality experience.
Lovely place!! Cats were absolutely adorable!! Coffee and lemonade was great (bff says the coffee was reaally good)! Would highly recommend visiting!!! Honestly one hour with the babies wasn't enough

It's a great place to go for cat lovers. Sit, drink some coffee, enjoy a room with a bunch of cats in it.

Remember, this is not a place to play with cats. It is a place to help rescue cats socialize to people. A specific cat might be new, or not feeling good, or just not want your attention. Let it be.
I love Mac Tabby! The staff are so kind and knowledgeable. The cats are top notch. 10/10 highly recommended the London Fog Lavender Latte and the cats!

Be prepared to have your heart stolen by these kitties! There's nothing like the energy of a lot of cats looking for your love... This place is super cute, they have a bunch of toys for you to interact with the cats, and their coffee is great as well. It does get busy. I recommend going on a slower day (non-weekend).
I'm was hanging out with my niece, petting cats, and sipping a cortado. An hour of fun.

We had a great time at Mac Tabby Cat Cafe. The cats were fun and interactive and the staff was super welcoming and friendly. We will be going back! Just wish there was a location a little closer to us - Matthews, NC would be a great spot for expansion!
Had such a great time playing with all the kitties!! Iced white mocha was delicious!!!
Great experience! Fun cats, great staff. Drinks are legit. The coffee is awesome!!

Been here several times and all have been wonderful. They have plenty of toys, cats with a variety of personalities, and really good food and drinks. Every time I go there is a new set of cat friends to meet :)

Stopped by on my last day in Charlotte today and words cannot express how wonderful this place is. The sweetest cats ever, delicious coffee, and very kind workers. Also the coffee shop and cat room are both adorable.

My daughter and I had the opportunity to spend time with the adoptable cats today and it was amazing from start to finish. They started promptly,  gently reminded the kids to stay silent when they got a bit excited, and it was VERY clean. I wore black sweat pants and left with virtually no cat hair in me (my orange cat leaves more hair on me than the entire cat room lol). It was a great experience and next time I'll try their coffee.
such a great little laid back place. the island breeze lotus was really delicious & obviously the cats were super adorable. had such a great time :)

Beautiful experience i could filling the void of having two of my babies away from me at this moment. I loved every single cat in here today, the coffee was great and everyone was so kind! will absolutely be coming back. (it was also my birthday so this was a great gift :) )

My  partner adopted a kitten from this place and the kitten essentially came to his home with a cold (Chex Mix). My partner was told that any watering eyes or sneezing is normal for kittens as they adjust, but within days this developed into a cold. His kitten now has red watery eyes and tons of sneezes.Usually, this is not a problem as most organizations will offer a low cost visit at an affiliated clinic and help the kitten they just adopted. However, after paying $140 for an adoption fee, which is steep and more than I've ever paid for my healthy humane society cats, they essentially told him to go find his own vet after a WEEK from his adoption date. Like I said before, the baby's eyes were watery the DAY AFTER he got the kitten and they did not take the situation seriously. Just be warned that this organization facilitates over priced adoptions under the guise that the cats have been vetted but really they have been given shots, months prior, and they have no idea on the kittens current condition! Save yourself the $70-90 and just head down to the humane society where they will actually vet your pet and provide you with medicine if they are sick.

What a truly magical experience! There is an abundance of toys, light, and positive energy radiating from this establishment!

Fruit Roll Up, Inga, Parker, and Eyebrows are just a few of the incredible felines that are not only playful, but so sweet!

Matt and Summer were super helpful and informative, they really set us up for success during our kitty experience today.

The drinks are also top notch! Thank you Mac tabby cat cafe, we look forward to visiting the concord location!

Visited Mac Tabby a month ago with a friend. We booked our appointment ahead so we could hang out with the cats. Once you get there you check in and they will promptly direct you to the room at the booked time. Coffee was amazing and the blueberry muffin as well!

Very positive experience! My son wanted to spend his birthday here with a few friends and they were very accommodating! Would definitely recommend for small gatherings! Staff was very helpful and warm!
Cozy up with coffee, quiet and kitties

We came here as a family and loved it. We have cats of our own and it was a great time out hanging out with hot chocolate and kitties. Sign the waiver ahead of time when you book and you'll have more time with the kitties. The staff is friendly and helpful, ready to answer any questions. Till next time.
Brought my 8 year old grandchild. Lovely atmosphere. Staff was kind and helpful.
I LOVE Mac Tabby in Noda! The coffee slaps, they ate! The kitties are so good and you can tell the fabulous ladies working there love them! I WILL BE BACK!
Relaxing vibe, amazing coffee & beer selection, adorable (adoptable!) cats and the nicest staff!
Such a heartwarming place! Staff was very friendly and the cats were all you ever hoped for!

My mom and I are both cat lovers so I surprised her with a visit here. We fell in love with this place! Unfortunately, we don't have one of these centers where we're from, but it was so cool to get to hang with the cats. As far as the drinks go, I ordered the ABJ smoothie and it was delish! Highly recommend this place; especially if you're looking to adopt :)

We were visiting in town and wanted a quiet coffee. This was perfect! You order drinks and they bring you into the room with the cats- where you are allowed to bring your drinks! The cats are absolutely spoiled and super friendly. Great environment for a quiet moment with some cute companions

Very friendly and attentive staff and a good menu selection for drinks at the cafe. The cats are very cute and playful and the staff ensure that everyone has a great time playing with them. Definitely recommend stopping by if in the area!

I had a nice time visiting with the cats. There were a lot of cats, maybe 8? They were friendly and none of them scratched or bit. There were toys, but only one cat was playful. The cats mostly laid around and let me pet them.

There was no odor, the place was clean, and there wasn't much cat hair.

I ordered a hot apple cider which was pleasant.
Such a wonderful time today at Mac Tabby! Cannot wait to go back.

The deserts were lovely! We ordered tea and coffee and everything was delicious! My whole family really enjoyed this experience. The staff were so nice and helpful and made the experience very special.
My roommate adopted a cat here a year ago and now it was my turn! This place is absolutely adorable and I now have my very first cat!
Loved it. Very relaxing, and I'll be back again
Great place to relax with a cup of coffee, Chai, or tea and hang out with the cats
Super fun. Somewhat expensive
No vale la pena pagar tanto solo por media hora y uno de los gatos estaba enfermo y botando sangre de su nariz

Cats were 5 stars! Half were sleepy half were playful all were very friendly. The staff wasn't very warm or friendly, which was off putting for it being out first time. Thankfully I read all the information on the website so I didn't have any questions and everything went smoothly. One employee told us we could enter if we had a reservation and then another employee asked us why we entered without checking in LOL, then right before the hour is up the coldly ask you to leave so the next party can enter. Not a big deal, it was super clean, fun, and a good time but nicer, warmer hosts/ employees would make this a 5 star coffee / cat shop.
Always a joy!

What an interesting experience. This is the first time I'm going after being recommended it by a friend. I'm not a cat person but a friend of mine was, but despite not being a cat person, I didn't think it disappointed. There is a small cafe section to buy drinks and etc, but you do not have to buy anything to go into the cat lounge. The cat lounge costs $10 and a reservation slot is required. We didn't know this but we walked in and were able to go in after ~30 minutes.

These cats are up for adoption so basically if you like a certain cat you can adopt it, I believe that is how it works. I will say that - you should not expect constant playtime with them because these cats are toyed around with humans all day - do not be sad if they are sitting there sleeping because they cannot always be playing around. 4/5

What a fabulous little coffee shop!
The drinks are superb and customer service is fantastic! This cafe is comfortable with all sorts of little sitting areas all decorated with cat themed pictures. For a few dollars you can even go into the cat room to play with cats. Highly recommend!
I brought my daughter here - she's obsessed with cats but we don't have one.  The staff was incredible, the cats were adorable, the coffee was great.  We will absolutely be back!
coffee + cats + little treats = recipe for purrfection<3 the staff was nice and obviously cared about the cats, coffee was delicious, and the atmosphere was very pleasant!

This is one of the best cat cafes I've ever been to! It was so clean and the cats are clearly well taken care of and not stressed with too many visitors. I was away from my lil boy cat for a week so needed a kitty fix! The location is great and a pretty good price for an hour ($12 and I went on a Tuesday). There's also coffee, smoothies, and snacks for purchase. Thank you for a great time!

Thank you for a wonderful morning with my daughter and her friends for her birthday! We really enjoyed the cats & I really enjoyed my delicious maple blondie latte. The lighting/mood/decor is so inviting- this is our second time here and we loved it. Very clean, attentive staff, with plenty of space for our group and another to pet & play. We will be back!

We went in hour before they close.
She charged us more then it was written on the board outside i took the photo on our way out then I realized she charged me more of what thy said and we went in just for half an hour. It was over all just a bad experience with costumer service she felt kinda weird she was so rude.
Cats were adorable

Y'all!! Mac Tabby is a phenomenal spot. Clearly owned and operated by folks who are truly passionate about the work they are doing, and their second-story cafe, tucked away in a vibrant part of NoDa, leaves nothing to be desired. The cafe is cozy and offers incredibly good coffee for a great price, and the cat lounge is perfect. The mix of felines is wonderful, and the staff clearly love them and are providing top-notch care for this crew. Schedule a visit ASAP and enjoy this purr-fect spot in Charlotte.

Jack, the one with the big belly, bit three people in the short time we were there and now I'm trying to convince my boyfriend that we need him. 10/10 would visit again. It also smelled nice in there.
I am in love with this place and would love to visit again and again and again

Great little spot but it adds up to enjoy an hour with the cats along with a drink and snack.

It does go to a good cause, but it's not something we'd do regularly based on the cost.
This was such a fun experience. The service and cats were the best.

I have been to a lot of cat cafes. This one not only had a well separated area with toys, but a good selection of teas. I also appericated the selection of cat themed soaps, jewelry, and garments. The screen of cat info excellent addition.

What a delightful cat cafe! I went during a weekday so I had the room to myself,  though immediately a cat plopped into my lap so there I remained for most of the hour. The room is clean and free of odor, the cats are so friendly, they have enough places to escape.

You can even order drinks from their little Cafe and bring them into the room with you. The staff were exceptionally friendly and I felt welcome.

Worst place ever. I drove all the way to this place with my 3 years old daughter and 10 years old sister to be rejected because they don't let in young kids. They refused to let my 3 years old daughter to enter so I said well let's not ruin it for everybody and just get my 10 years old sister to enjoy her time with the cats while we're there. Guess what? They wouldn't let her in because she had to be accompanied by an adult, and the only adult there was me, and I had to stay outside with my daughter. The place is just a lobby and a room with a glass door with the cats inside. We wasted our day and had to go back home with no one enjoying their time at all.
Such a cute little place for coffee, drinks, and cats! Didn't order anything but the coffees looked good, they had a decent selection of beer, and some small bites! Definitely need to come again
We had a great time! Everyone was so nice and welcoming (both people and cats)! Highly recommend

Paying for cats to ignore you is what cat cafes are all about . The people working there were really nice and the coffee was good - lots of beverage options. And cats are adorable even if they are ignoring you.
Amazing place!

Our first visit was such a hit I have already booked our second. The space is very nice and guarantees you have fun with some sweet kitties! Lots of toys to play with. And surprisingly it smells so great in there (I expected a room with a dozen cats to have an unpleasant odor, but not at all!)
Staff was very sweet and helpful. And so far they've had 1,400 cats adopted <3!!!!!

I visited the location in downtown Concord and had the best experience. My vanilla latte with almond milk was so good, I had two. The employees were so friendly and welcoming, it felt like we were all friends. And then there were the CATS! Omg. I had a hard time leaving once my time was up. Thank you so much for such an awesome morning.
This place is super cute! Staff is awesome, cats are (of course) amazing, we will definitely be back!

Mac Tabby cat cafe is one of our favorite places to go. They've got coffee, wine and cats so it's pretty much like heaven. Here's just a few things that make it such a special place to me
1. Kitty cats! All cats adoptable and vetted by the rescue they work with to ensure their cats are placed in a suitable environment that meets all their needs. Not every cat is a "cafe cat" but Mac Tabby's cats are some of the most social/outgoing cats you'll meet. The rescue and cafe does such a great job at making sure these cats are taken care of and going to the home they deserve.
2. Friendly Staff. You will always see smiling faces when you walk in and everyone their seems to really enjoy their job. They are very kind and helpful towards customers and the kitties.
3. Drinks! Definitely one of my favorite places for coffee. They have soooo many options to choose from and they can personalize almost anything you order! If you're allergic to cats, you still gotta come for the coffee, because their cafe area is cat free and just a very cozy environment to relax and watch kitties from the windows.
4. Atmosphere and location. Mac Tabby Charlotte is located in the cool hippy like area of Noda. Very beautiful place to spend the day. The atmosphere of the cafe is very pleasant, spunky and comfortable.

All in all I give this place 100 stars! You need to visit this place! You will leave with the biggest smile on your face(:

i love this place sm !! yesterday was my day to play w the little guys !! i had a nice convo w one of the workers even tho i do have a tendency to talk ppls ears off !! i forgorr the name of one of the little guys but the crazy long haired one rly liked me ! very silly guy with a very silly personality ! he was wild with fun ! the only criticism is that most of the the guests are annoying and u can tell they cannot handle rejection well or respect spaces of literally anyones for that matter , usually id tell them off for trying to oversim both me and the little guys but ! i was having a poopy day soo i j wanted to focus on the little guys ! tho this one couple was rly cool !! i will come again soon ! vry awesome nd vry cool . ( p.s thank u for the kind person on the phone who understood tht i had to take public transport to get there ! it was soo bad bc ubers kept canceling :( but it was okii bc they understood tht i was running late bc of it ! yippee ! )

Wonderful Experience!   Staff is so kind and friendly.   It was great to interact with the cats for an hour, you really get to see all their personalities.  The cat room is pristine and just so much fun.  A must do if you love cats and especially if you want to adopt.
Great place to go to!

Drinks were great and the cats were really cool to hang out with. There were several kittens (youngest was 4 months) and a few adult cats with a variety of personalities; some were very playful, a few wanted to chill and hang out, and a cat or two wanted to observe the new people coming in; all of the cats were well socialized. There was an employee in the cat playroom to answer questions, which was really nice. The cats had bios and are adoptable.
Great time hanging out with the friendly kittens.
We had a great time with the kitties. The staff was friendly, and you could tell the cats and cafe are well taken care of. We'll definitely visit again!
Very clean, nicely decorated, great service, the cats were very fun!!

Absolutely AMAZING! This cat cafe was so much fun, the drinks/coffee are great! I highly recommend this experience and the cats are so friendly and fun to play with! Be sure to get down here if your looking for a cool and chill time!

While on vacation to North Carolina, our party of 8 visited Mac Tabby on Friday, June 30th.  We had a WONDERFUL experience other than the lady who waited on us at our first visit - she was surprisingly a little nasty.  EVERYBODY else was totally GREAT!  We had been told not to bother with reservations which totally turned out to not be true.  MAKE RESERVATIONS!!!  ;-)  After getting a reservation then arriving later the same day, we went to the kitty lounge.  It's a 10 person limit in the lounge so our party of 8 (plus two others) was easily accomodated.

We did not get any food but the drinks we had were awesome. All 4 kids and 4 adults were super impressed with the drinks!

Our one hour long segment with the cats in the lounge area was soooo sweet and yes - therapeutic!  The atmosphere was totally chill, from the staff to the kitties.  A couple of staff members were in the lounge and were very helpful with the kids engaging the kitties and answering all the questions from everybody.  The cats varied in type, age, color and disposition but without kittens (waaah) and yes, they are available for adoption.  The cat visit segment was just so great, I cannot put it into words.

The only (very small) problem that we had on the day we visited (6/30/2023) had nothing to do with Mac Tabby Cat Cafe nor the sort of nasty lady - there is a LOT of construction going on around the Mac Tabby location and hardly any parking available nearby.  HOWEVER, there is a nice free-parking(!!!) garage a very short 1/2 block away - so short that I didn't even work up a sweat on a 93 degree F day!
Bottom line:  Yes, we ALLL loved Mac Tabby!  Yes, we ALLL heartily recommend Mac Tabby!  And YES!  We will be back again on our next visit to North Carolina!

I recently rented the room for my husband's birthday. The staff were so nice exuding passion for the cats. We weren't just pointed to the room but actually accompanied introducing us to some of the kitties and telling us stories of their rescue. This was our second visit and look forward to returning. We live out of state so that should say something! Keep on doing what y'all are doing! You are greatly appreciated!!

Love MacTabby Cafe and everything they do for these kitties. The cafe is very clean and so much fun! Staff is fantastic, they take great care of the cats. Their drink selection is also quite extensive and delicious. We were fortunate enough to adopt a cat that we fell in love with when visiting the NoDa location. I recommend applying for application approval before you get your heart set on a certain kitty if you're looking to adopt. Thank you for bringing us our sweet Sara Lee and for all you do!

What a beautiful cat cafe! We visited 4th of July weekend and were able to get two of their walk up slots for a 30 minute visit. The first area you walk into is their cafe, with a rather wide selection of drinks and merchandise. Once you are ushered into the next room with the cats you can see how much they care about their cats based on the wide variety of toys and bedding. The staff was very caring and attentive to the specific needs of the cats and you could tell that all the cats were very at peace here. A very therapeutic experience while benefiting a great cause!
The workers were very friendly and excited to talk about the cats. I also got a small energy drink, which was super tasty!!!

This place is an adorable hidden gem! The employees are really nice and the cats are all very willing to be pet. I took two pre-teen boys who have zero experience with animals and they loved getting to pet the cats while they slept (which the cats surprisingly seemed to enjoy). The boys even suggested we go back the next day!
Very nice place with great staff and a clean space

The staff were friendly and the place was very nice. I was disappointed to hear that we were not allowed to pick up the cats. The amount of people allowed in verses how many cars were awake was a bit too many so you were limited on cat availability to play with. Great place just not the experience I had hoped for.
One of the best concepts ever created.

It was a very pleasant experience.  All of the staff were extremely welcoming, helpful, and worked well with one another. The environment was very clean, smelt pleasing, and nicely decorated. The biggest plus was the bathroom.  This was one of the cleanest, nicest smelling public bathrooms I have visited. Thank you!!
Great place to interact with some cool cats! The price is very affordable and it is kid friendly.
Unique and for cat lovers
Little discreet location with very warm staff. Good drinks, very friendly cats. Highly recommended for cat lovers, and people looking to adopt a cat.

i went in and i thought it was just gonna be a coffee shop and cats were just there to play w not having to pay  was not the case but that's on me for not researching , anyways i just feel like we should be told that a certain time cats are tired and don't want to play instead of just immediately asking for how long we want to be there . that's just my opinion bc it's not fair to the cats who are tired and having people touch them to just go make the peoples moneys worth. anyways i was there not half the time i paid for bc there was nothing to do at all since the cats were sleeping , that's why i think customers should be told to do less time because the cats are tired . while i was there i honestly felt like it was just for the profit because it was obvious the cats didn't want to be played with , but the workers didn't seem to care in my opinion   also while we were there, these little girls were just asking questions about the toys and one of the workers would reply with attitude, like they're just little kids .. also the coffee was mid at best

Wonderful experience. This place is making dreams come true for the kitties and those who are interested in adopting one (or two?!). Highly recommended whether you are ready to adopt or just want to see what it's all about.

They are located upstairs of the building and have a good amount of space. You don't have to walk through the cats' space to get to the cafe if you are just going for coffee and to look.
The staff was so sweet and quick. The shop is super clean and welcoming. We honestly had a great time.

This was my first visit here, and what a wonderful experience it was! The staff were very friendly and happy to answer any questions guests might have, the drinks were great (though a little too much on the sweet side), and of course, the cats were great company to drink near and feed treats to
The staff was so pleasant and accommodating. And we loved interacting with the kitties. I really appreciate the cause and we will definitely return.
Have decent cats! Wish they can provide more treats so we can have more interaction with the cats
loved loved loved !! amazing experience here
Very friendly and welcoming staff. The woman was very knowledgeable and great with my children! And the cats were all amazing and friendly!
DELICIOUS coffee!

Such a wonderful place! The drinks we had before arriving inside the magical spot that is Mac Tabby's were delicious. All of the cats are well taken care of and are very happy, social and all around lovable. We had a 30 minute slot and wished we had opted for the full hour. This is a must-visit when in NoDa!

We have visited Mac Tabby several times and we love it. The kitties are so well taken care of. The experience is calming and almost therapeutic. Each time I've been there I've fallen in love with another sweet kitty. We have two of our own, and although I am not at a place to take home a third, we are able to follow all the kitties at the cafe online and see that they are adopted to good homes. We visited just a few weeks ago and the Cafe has had full turnover! That means each sweet kitty has been adopted! We love Mac Tabby and no doubt we will be back soon!

Just drinks and snacks.  The hook is the CATS.  Reserve an hour, for a fee, and sit in the cat room while sipping your coffee.  Room holds 10-12 adults and about a dozen cats.  Fill out the adoption papers before you go-- so if you fall in love you can claim a cat.
Sooo cuteee!!
Todo fue exelente la atencion los gatos lo unico q dificulto es q estaba algo lleno y no habia mucho espacio para sentarse en la zona de los gatos aparte de ese detalle todo fue exelente

The service is always impeccable. The people are so nice. I am amazed at the adoption rates and the care of the cats. I have been coming for a while and will continue to because it is one of my favorite places

Great spot to grab coffee and hang out with cats! The location is perfect and there are seats that overlook the bustling action on north Davidson street, and the staff are extremely welcoming and friendly. The coffee is great and fairly priced, and if you are ready for the commitment all the cats you can visit are up for adoption, just be sure to call ahead if you are planning to spend time with them because the cat room fills up fast, especially on the weekends!
Had a wonderful time here with my daughter and her best friend. An hour of playing and cuddling with cats is the best way to spend an afternoon!
We love Mac Tabby in Concord! Seriously, the best coffee, vibe and adorable cats. Highly recommended. My 10 year old daughter absolutely loved it!

This location is absolutely wonderful. It has great parking and is very easy to find. It has a beautiful entrance and you can see the cats right away. The cats have so many toys to play with and a variety of things to climb on. The employee even came in and gave us treats to give to the cats. Would definitely recommend and plan to return myself!
This place is heaven on earth! I loved every minute of my experience. I can't wait to go back!

SO impressed! MacTabby turned out to be one of our favorite stops while visiting Charlotte/Concord. I had heard of cat cafes before and while I would not consider myself a cat person (allergies) I always thought the concept was genius and would not hesitate to support it. As a result, we decided on an afternoon coffee after a hike and made the drive down to MacTabby. The cafe portion of the experience was great. The coffee flavors/options were unique and I had a hard time narrowing my selections down to something I would like because everything seemed awesome. This is separate and sectioned off so you can have your beverage in a different location and NOT socialize with the cats if you don't want to. The cat portion of the experience was so sweet. I took some allergy meds and just went for it...It was $8 for 30 minutes and the kitties were so social. Very friendly, very cute and very well cared for. Overall this was a wonderful experience that comes highly recommended if you're looking for a cat to adopt and/or just need some time with a little kitty that wants to be loved on.

Love this place!! Anyone who plans on going please try to not "hog" cats. I try to be courteous and move around the room so everyone, including myself, can meet all the cats. There was a couple today that hogged 4 of the most cuddly cats there, and weren't even petting them :( it left 8 of us to share about 6 cats and about half of those were skiddish and didn't like to be touched a lot, so we ended up just sitting there. This isn't Mac Tabby's fault at all. Just a reminder to everyone going. Especially since these cats are up for adoption we want everyone to get a chance to meet all the cats!!

I always been a normal guest when I had the financial I love coming here with my best friend a lot, she's the reason I know this place new cats their personalities this best place to be at their tea is wonderful.
Thank you for always making a place I can be happy at.
This helps my autism so much.
I absolutely loved this place. The staff was so wonderful and pleasant. The coffee was amazing and all the kitties omg loved them all couldn't get enough!!
absolutely loved hanging with all the kitties and drinking goood local coffee.

I made a reservation to celebrate my birthday in a special way. I was running a few minutes late since there was traffic and we were driving all the way from SC. I called and informed them. They said they'd make it work. When we arrived the employees were not very warm or welcoming. The total opposite actually. It almost felt like we were visiting inmates at a prison with their demeanor. Didn't offer a drink, had to ask about ordering a coffee. The whole time we were in there they were just watching us intensely as we played with the cats. It was very overbearing to say the least. They then asked us to leave and didn't care to honor my whole hour. It was not special at all. Was very disappointed.
Amazing experience!!! Wonderful staff! Of course the cats were beautiful
never disappoints. $12 for 1 hour. adopt a kitty!
Always a good time with friendly folks and adorable cats

Absolutely go visit this place if you like cats and coffee. Although they do serve beer and wine as well. It was like $8 to hang out with a room full of kittens and they were all eager to play. Plus you can adopt them as well!
Place is rad, man. Great coffee and tea, beer, wine, etc.....AND CATS! LOTS OF CATS!

The Cat Cafe is a amazing place to enjoy cats and meet others who like cats. You get plenty of time with the cats and most are super friendly. I don't like the prices though. The prices are way too high and it's just ridiculous to pay that much!!!

Very beautiful space, but the workers ignored us and favored certain customers over my daughter and me. They even carried two cats over to sit on certain customers' laps. We left early despite paying for an hour due to this. The downtown location has friendlier cats and better customer service I hear, avoid this location.

Took my sister for her birthday, I did not even know this place was in Charlotte. I do recommend this for any cat lover or anyone actually. Cats are very friendly and playful. 10/10! Parking in the very front is limited, there is more parking right behind it and across the street.
Such a cool place! Coffee is great, snacks are great (they have gluten free options- thanks Kayla!)- and of course, the cats are great. We had such a good time. Best date night ever
Such a great place! A good-sized menu with small trinkets like magnets, earrings, and coffee - not to mention the friendly kitties you can play with! I had a great time!
We had wonderful experience! Fantastic and friendly staff, beautiful space, and all around good energy!
Realizing you can pet cats, or just sit with them, in a comfortable environment is quite a treat. Check the site ahead of time to see which cats are available to adopt. Have a hot tea. Chill. Cheers!
So cute i love the cats

Stellar spot in all aspects! The staff is very friendly and helpful, and of course the cats are a delight.

I also deeply appreciate how thoroughly the website addresses any questions someone might have on their first visit! Made my experience absolutely stress-free.

What a wonderful place! We made a reservation about a month in advance when we knew we'd be visiting close to Mac Tabby. The cat room is large enough that even though there were 10 people in there, it didn't seem crowded at all. We were free to move around and visit with several of the kittens; some were sleeping, some were active and playful. I was pretty excited that we could bring toys for them as well - as soon as we got there one of them practically jumped into my bag to get the catnip mice out :) Though we didn't get anything at the cafe', I like that there was a pretty big assortment and that you could bring your selection into the cat room with you (or they'd bring it in to you if you were already there). Knowing that a small fee goes to help so many of these wonderful cats, I'd be visiting there weekly if I lived in the area. I will absolutely make another stop in the next time I'm in the area.

Loved this place- I didn't do the full five stars only because it was my first time being here and there were a lot of unsupervised kids present. I know this isn't strictly the cafes fault but I witness some children being super aggressive with the cats until they almost attacked. (Ex- shoving toys in their face, putting hands and fingers in their face when they're clearly annoyed, shoving toys in the employee only room where the litter boxes are, etc.) My only suggestion is allowing slots for people that are 18+ only, just to give older people time to unwind and interact/meet with the cats without kids present. Regardless awesome and friendly staff and great selection of drinks and cute kitties!
This is a lovely experience!
Such an amazing place
Amazing! Staff was lovely and the cats are all so friendly. Will definitely be back.
Love this place. Staff are wonderful and cats are adorable.
Stop in and try an iced PSL!  Simply the best I've ever had!  And for a mere $8 you can enjoy it while snuggling a feline friend

SUCH A FRESH IDEA
This is Cat Lovers Paradise! I brought my husband here while visiting Charlotte in a secret date and he was happy as a kid:) Even tho, I'm more a dogs person, i have to say that life with cats is a game changer I took lot of pictures!
Very cute and fun experience. Katy was the employee who helped us and she was so kind and amazing :)
Such a great experience! The staff was so friendly the coffee was yummy and the cats - well they were perfect!

Mac Tabby Cat Cafe is ran by an extraordinary team, doing incredible things. They just passed their 1000'th adoption to date, that's 1000 happy cats that otherwise might not have had a forever home. If you happen to get lucky enough to run into Lori, she can make a mean latte to top it all off! Thanks for everything y'all do Mac Tabby!

The Mac Tabby Cat Cafe in Concord is such a neat place! We booked the cat room for an hour and the cats were so sweet and the room was awesome; lots of cat toys to interact with the cats and very clean, smelled amazing! The employees were so helpful and pleasant, and they serve a nice variety of beer as well as coffee, tea and smoothies and other treats. I can't wait to go back!

Awesome coffee
Cute vibe

Such a great experience! The space is very clean and welcoming. And the kitties are just the sweetest! We didn't try anything from the cafe this visit but we definitely will next time. I highly recommend making a trip.
Delicious, fast and friendly!!

The hosts were very chill and friendly. The room was clean and smelled really fresh. The cats were sweet and it was just very calming to sit in there for an hour and be with the cats. It was even better because we got to pay with a Groupon, so we got a nice discount. Would definitely go again to relax.
Loved playing with the cats!!! Officer was my favorite!!

Very clean and well maintained areas. Loved the spacious room where we interacted with the cats. They are well cared for and happy. Glad that so many were already adopted and just waiting for final pickup.
Coffee was very good and enjoyed the cats that were awake. Lots a sleepy kitties at the time we arrived.
One of my favorite places!
Great coffee and lots of cats, all up for adoption. Be prepared to wait for a time slot to pet the cats. Very friendly owner and excellent location!!
Most magical place in Charlotte. In addition to a dozen well mannered cats they have the best baristas. They have coffee and tea, beer and wine and more. Put this place at the top of your list.
Such a great place to visit

Fun place to go and play with cats. The staff is lovely. When my cat loving friends come to town they really enjoy visiting. I love the idea of being able to meet cats in a relaxed environment if you're considering adopting. Go and have fun!
We had a very relaxing time with the cats. The cafe was very clean and the cats were friendly and happy. Delicious iced coffee and cookies. Will plan another trip soon!
Had a meet up with friends. Very relaxed atmosphere. Great coffee! The cats were well behaved. Had a charming experience.
Great experience.
Best cats ever! They have a wide selection of drinks, coffee, beer, wine, etc. If you want the cats to be more active go in the morning. If you want them laying around go in the afternoon.

One of the BEST cat cafes in the nation, surrounded by a cool art district with tons of yummy food options as well!  Super friendly staff, an amazing art collection, excellent selection of craft beers and of course, snuggly kittens!!!
Such a great place!! We booked a private hour and the kids, parents and grandparents all loved it!

Really disappointed by my most recent visit here. Ive been a few times and usually have a positive experience, but visited yesterday to make an appointment for a friend and I at 3:30, a couple hours out. About an hour before my appointment I ended up with a bad migraine that impacted my vision and felt sick, so I went to cancel my appointment and they informed me they don't do refunds. Seriously? I didn't even buy anything, just a space that they could easily fill as the place was packed. Not giving a refund doesn't make sense.

We visited today for a private lounge visit.  The staff were all friendly and wonderful, beautiful clean location, delicious drinks and some of the sweetest cats available for adoption.   We had an awesome time and will definitely return.
Is this home?

I had a very lovely experience. I decided to go there while on vacation. The cats were so sweet! The cafe had a very cute and aesthetic setup too! Sawyer and Robert were my favorite cats. The drink I got was also very tasty! They have cute merchandise as well!  If I am ever in the area again I will definitely go back!
As a cat lover, I must say.. this place is awesome!

The staff is very friendly and attentive. The facility is very clean, and there are plenty of toys to use to play with the cats.   The cats all have different personalities, some like to rest and some like to play and interact.  I have taken my grandsons here twice and they love it. You can make reservations online, which is very convenient.

We absolutely love visiting the Mac Tabby Cat Cafe. Playing with the kitties and cats is so much fun. The cafe is super clean, the cat room is really cool with lots of cats toys and cats lounging around. And, knowing they are helping to get so many cats into their fur ever home is awesome.

Also, lots of goodies available like drinks, snacks, and awesome t shirts for sale.
The girls and i love your cafe! We love your cats! So beautiful and sweet and fun! We will definitely be back and visiting the Concord location!
Coffee was excellent, the cats were adorable and they had plenty of toys around to play with them. Highly recommend for an hour of fun, relaxing time.
Muy costoso

Once of my favorite places to go when visiting NC. The cats are all so sweet and well taken care of. The ladies who run the place are wonderful and do a fantastic job. The drinks are seriously tasty and they have adorable accessories and trinkets. Kudos for making such a special place that has helped home over 800 cats!
Super Cafe ! Le personnel est super accueillant, les chats sont gentils et trop mignons, on a envie de tous les adopter  en tout cas tres bonne experience, j'y retournerais avec plaisir !
